data.text: @kaupolepasepp Hello! We apologize for this situation. Thare can be many reasons, however busy summer season, slow service around the airports and strikes, air traffic control impacts our operations which then may delay our next operations as aircraft arrives late from previous destination.

@LiinussF Labvakar! Globālo piegāžu ķēžu problēmu dēļ airBaltic ir īslaicīgi izīrējusi papildu lidmašīnas, lai nodrošinātu tās plānoto lidojumu grafiku un to, ka pasažieri sasniedz iecerēto galamērķi.
Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām.
@nnipis 💚💚💚
@SheepCunningham Good morning! Yes, this may be offered at the online check-in or airport’s check-in desk, however only in cases when availability on the flight permits that.
@MimiBrady13 Hello! Please check your DMs!

@Pinay_chismax Thank you. We kindly ask you to contact Turkish Airlines for more details and updates in this case as the last airline performing the flights in the itinerary is responsible for the tracing and search.

data.text: @Pinay_chismax Hello! Sorry to hear about such unpleasant situation, our apologies. May we kindly ask you to clarify as which airline performed the second flight for you in this itinerary?
@zunaine Labrīt! Lūdzam DM ziņā atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par rezervāciju (rezervācijas numurs, pasažieru vārdi), pārbaudīsim!

@my55cents Hello! We once again apologize for this unpleasant situation. Our teams and representatives are doing their best in order to locate all the delayed bags as soon as possible. Once it has been done, you will be contacted. Thanks for your patience.

@CDP143S Good morning! This is not ok. Our apologies for such unpleasant situation. In order to better understand all the circumstances we kindly ask you to submit us a claim: https://t.co/N04NoZd2An
Our Customer Relations department will investigate this.

data.text:
@DmoneyAbz Hello! Our apologies for delayed baggage.
Unfortunately we won’t be able to comment more on this as baggage’s routing is done by the airport’s Lost & Found office and may depend on flights available the most soonest, as well as their availability.

See you on board the third time as well? 💚🤗

data.text:
@grinvaldsjanis @Prusis Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām saistībā ar plānotā lidmašīnas ekipējuma maiņu. Lidmašīnas izvēlēto maršrutu iespaido dažādi apstākļi - operacionāli iemesli, plānotais lidojuma ilgums, u.c.
Arī informējam, ka airBaltic šobrīd neveic lidojumus uz Rumāniju, vai Poliju.

@Prusis Paldies par jaukajiem vārdiem!

Priecīgus Līgo! 🌿

Midsummer magic is in the air - join in on the fun and play the game to either discover Latvian Midsummer traditions or just refresh your memory! 💐🔥☀️ Play the game to get a 10 EUR discount for your next flight and join the raffle to win two ✈️ tickets: https://t.co/LjCbFTy0Jn https://t.co/M2AJUt0rGs

airBaltic’s twelfth #NFT collection is live! 🔔 The new edition of the City Collection features Līvāni #cryptoart and can now be purchased by #NFTCommmunity on OpenSea marketplace for a fixed price of 0.05 Ether: https://t.co/EVESigqiAz https://t.co/pJ4uCNwvp4

urls.title: airBaltic City Collection - Collection | OpenSea
urls.description: airBaltic – the flag carrier of Latvia, in honour of Latvia’s centenary, in 2018, invited everyone to vote on their favourite towns and cities in Latvia, after which the company’s Airbus A220-300 fleet was named. Starting with Kuldiga, these cities will now one by one be represented on the digital art pieces issued by airBaltic. airBaltic’s jet fleet is the youngest in the Europe, consisting solely of the brand new Airbus A220-300.

data.text: @sezgikaya Hello! May we kindly ask you to try again from a different internet connection or browser? Does the same issue persists?

@anoreksijalv @vmakarovs @Talis_L Diemžēl globālās piegāžu ķēžu problēmas ir ietekmējušas arī atsevišķu airBaltic lidmašīnām nepieciešamo rezerves detaļu pieejamību. Pašlaik airBaltic īstermiņā izīrējusi dažas papildu lidmašīnas, lai nodrošinātu tās plānoto lidojumu grafiku.

@vmakarovs @Talis_L Labvakar! Atvainojamies par atcelto reisu un jau iepriekš pateicamies par pacietību. Informējam, ka šobrīd saņemam palielinātu zvanu skaitu, lūgums sazināties ar aģentiem nedaudz vēlāk. Pateicamies par sapratni!

@ExoticChy Hello! Thanks for your message.  From the screenshot you have provided we see that the booking details have been inserted incorrectly. May we kindly ask you to share your booking reference number with us via DM? We will check! Thank you.

data.text: @LMZobova Hello! Please be informed that due  to the impact caused by the global supply chain issues, airBaltic has temporarily wet leased additional aircraft to ensure its planned flight schedule and that the passengers reach their desired destination. Apologies for the inconveniences.

Our colleagues will get in touch with you. Thank you.

data.text: @KPitkevica Labdien! Pirmkārt, atvainojamies par reisa kavēšanos. Informējam, ka reģistrācijas laiks nemainās un tiek saglabāts, balstoties uz sākotnējo izlidošanas laiku. Tāpat aicinām pasažierus ierasties lidostā vismaz divas stundas pirms oriģināli plānotā izlidošanas laika. Paldies.
@ELbanditodeGME Unfortunately we won't be able to comment on any potential infrastructural issues. We would suggest you to contact the representatives of the said airport for more details. Thank you.

@vaivads Labdien, Ivar! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Informējam, ka - ja rezervācijā ir zīdainis, auto krēsliņu (vai ratus, vai kulbu) iespējams pārvadāt bez maksas. Ja rezervācijā ir bērns, auto sēdeklīti iespējams pārvadāt kā reģistrēto bagāžu pēc reģistrētās bagāžas nosacījumiem. Paldies.

@ArnisKancans @BorksPutnins @A_Reizenbergs @lufthansa Labvakar! Paldies par Jūsu ziņām. Informējam, ka globālo piegāžu ķēžu problēmu dēļ airBaltic ir īslaicīgi izirējusi papildu lidmašīnas, lai nodrošinātu tās plānoto lidojumu grafiku un to, ka pasažieri sasniedz savu iecerēto galamērķi. Paldies.

Nonetheless, we’re looking forward to welcoming even more as we continue our growth: https://t.co/FRmUwRYYbG https://t.co/fj4FoSz6Yi

data.text: @rodnijs Kā jau minējām, akcijas cenu biļešu skaits ir ierobežots. Tomēr konkrētajā maršrutā atsevišķos datumos tās vēl ir pieejamas oktobra mēnesī. Paldies.
@rodnijs @PTACgovLV 2/2 Biļetes par akcijas cenu konkrētajā maršrutā vēl pieejamas atsevišķos datumos oktobra mēnesī. Paldies.

@rodnijs Labdien! Aicinām ņemt vērā, ka minētā cena norādīta lidojumiem vienā virzienā. Tāpat atgādinām, ka akcijas biļešu skaits ir ierobežots un liela pieprasījuma dēļ, biļetes konkrētās cenu grupās, konkrētos maršrutos un datumos var tikt izpirktas ātrāk. 1/1

@archs182 @PTACgovLV Labdien, Artūr! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Informējam, ka globālo piegāžu ķēžu problēmu dēļ esam ir īslaicīgi izirējuši papildu lidmašīnas, lai nodrošinātu tās plānoto lidojumu grafiku un to, ka pasažieri sasniedz savu iecerēto galamērķi. Paldies.

Morocco, here we come! ☀️🇲🇦 Starting late October this year, we're launching a new route from Riga to Marrakesh - our first ever scheduled route to Africa!
✈️ Flights to Marrakesh will be available twice a week: https://t.co/4yXvoiDbik https://t.co/rfGyO4mirx

urls.title: airBaltic announces new winter destination – Marrakesh
urls.description: airBaltic announces that starting from late October it will launch new flights from Riga to Marrakesh in Morocco

data.text: @Guste_FlaGeolet Please check the previously sent link. Contact information is available at the bottom of the page by following the said link. :) Thank you.
@officialstevew Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. May we kindly ask you to share your booking reference number with us by writing a DM? We will check. Thank you.

@Guste_FlaGeolet May we kindly ask you to clarify? Please note that the previously mentioned form is for official claim submission and is used for different types of claims. To request a refund for a cancelled flight we kindly invite you to contact our Reservations department. Thank you.

@Guste_FlaGeolet Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. Firstly, please accept our apologies for the flight cancellation. In your particular case, we kindly invite to contact our Reservations department, if you wish to receive refund for the said flight: https://t.co/mioTD1Fs3a
Thank you.

data.text: @gab_bm Hello, Gabriel! Thanks for reaching out to us. Please note that our check-in desks usually opens approximately 2 hours before the flight departure time. Therefore - they should be open at any time. Thank you.

We have some pretty great news - our network is expanding! 💚 And you may ask, what could be better than a new destination? Two new destinations! ✈️✈️ 

Here are some hints... Can you guess them? 👀 Keep an eye out for the reveal next week! https://t.co/7pxmkL4Arh

@kristinemarsh Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. Please be informed that you can skip the document submission step and continue the check-in process as usual. All necessary documents will be checked at the airport. Thank you.

@gunaleiskalne Atvainojamies par šo nepatīkamo situāciju. Vai varētu lūgt privātajā ziņā mums atsūtīt vairāk detaļas (pazaudētās bagāžas faila numuru/birku), lai varam apskatīt situāciju sīkāk? Paldies par sapratni!

@DidzisSilis Labdien, Didzi! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Lūdzam atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par rezervāciju, ko cenšaties veikt (lidojuma maršrutu, datumu, pasažieru skaitu, e-pasta adresi kā arī ekrānšāviņu ar veikto transakciju), raksot mums privātu ziņu. Pārbaudīsim! Paldies.

@gunaleiskalne Labdien, Gunta! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Esam sarūgtināti dzirdēt par šādu situāciju. Laipni aicinām iesniegt oficiālu sūdzību mūsu mājas lapā: https://t.co/KyWmFGU2Mk
Mūsu kolēģi no Klientu apkalpošanas nodaļas izmeklēs konkrēto gadījumu un sazināsies ar Jums. Paldies.

urls.title: Fleet | About us | airBaltic
urls.description: How many planes do you think there are in the airBaltic fleet? Find your answer online. See how many Boeing and Bombardier aircraft we fly.

data.text: @Murr_berg Labdien! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu un vērību. Informējam, ka links ir salabots un tas ved uz mūsu izpārdošanas piedāvājumu lapu! :) Paldies.

Last minute SALE is here! ⏰ Now is the time to grab the remaining seats on summer flights to many gorgeous European destinations for deliciously low prices and have the perfect weekend getaway: https://t.co/RhxSpf8JnN

Book 🎫 07.06 - 14.06.2022 
Travel ✈️ 28.06 - 29.10.2022 https://t.co/W4VpFTlBpY

urls.title: Last-minute deals!
urls.description: Summer flights to many gorgeous European destinations.

data.text: @RolandsDiga Labvakar! Globālo piegāžu ķēžu problēmu dēļ airBaltic ir īslaicīgi izīrējusi papildu lidmašīnas, lai nodrošinātu tās plānoto lidojumu grafiku un to, ka pasažieri sasniedz iecerēto galamērķi. Pateicamies par sapratni!
@simonasbartkus @riga_airport Hello! We can confirm that it was a test flight. Thank you.

June issue of Baltic Outlook is out 🗺️ This month read about Rhodes, the magnificent Greek island 🇬🇷  Also known as the “Knights’ island”, this destination is a real medieval fairy tale with a splash of cosmopolitan vibes and plenty of sunshine: https://t.co/blxxpv3u72 https://t.co/Y2JuWmYkKy

urls.title: Baltic Outlook magazine | airBaltic
urls.description: Be they adventurous backpackers or sophisticated voyagers, the monthly Baltic Outlook magazine is an excellent resource for any kind of travellers.

data.text: @Baiba_Baida @DublinAirport Hello, Baiba! Thanks for reaching out to us. We have just received information that there is a delay in the opening of check-in desk. However, situation is currently being addressed and the agent should arrive soon. Our apologies for the inconveniences.

data.text: @Travel_Papi Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. May we kindly ask you to share more details in regards to your booking (booking reference number) as well as screenshot of the said message for check-in payment by writing us a Direct Message? We will check. Thank you.
@alisa04588574 Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. We kindly invite you to check your Facebook Messenger where we have provided you with an answer. Thank you.

@RenarsZemits Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. May we kindly ask you to send more details in regards to the booking you were trying to make (route, dates, passenger details) here via DM? We will check! :) Thank you.

data.text:
@Commander_Ivy Hello, Lina! Thanks for reaching out. Firstly, please accept our sincere apologies for the inconveniences. In this case we kindly invite you to submit us an official claim: https://t.co/hsp1wiTwY9
Our colleagues from Customer Relations department will get back to you. Thank you.

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic
urls.description: Left your belongings on the plane? Was your baggage delayed? You can submit a claim about baggage, flight irregularities and more to airBaltic online.

data.text: @Sulzanoka @Schiphol Hello, Kristine! Thanks for reaching out to us. Please be informed that the mentioned flight unfortunately is slightly delayed. Currently planned departure time - 19:15. Our apologies for the inconveniences caused.
